reviews.text: Très petit mais pour nous c'était suffisant. Petit bémol, j'ai du partir a 9h30 au lieu de 11h30. La femme de ménage est venu, ne parlait pas Français, donc obligé de partir et de ne pas contester alors que ce n'est pas cet horaire qui été prévu.
reviews.name: Justine

reviews.text: Parfait pour un court séjour au coeur de Paris
reviews.name: Zo

reviews.text: Logement en fond de cour et en sous sol. Très bien situé dans Paris, mais très rudimentare. Qualité vraiment en dessous de nos espérances.
reviews.name: Geoffrey

reviews.text: La location est génial mais les lits étaient extrêmement dure.
reviews.name: Bret

reviews.text: Everything went great, last minute check-in and great communication.
reviews.name: Melania

reviews.text: The location is awesome and Ke helped us to do the check in and check out easy.
reviews.name: Hugo

reviews.text: Punctual with our check in and exactly what we paid for and experienced
reviews.name: Connor

reviews.text: Ke's place was a great value for the location. The house was a little small and not super clean, but it's worth it if you want to be near central Paris for cheap!
reviews.name: Nick

reviews.text: The metro station is relatively close, it is easy to get to the apartment. It is a small apartment but enough to be a short stay. The bed is a bit hard. There is a bit of musty smell. The stove works well and there are plates and pans that can be used.
reviews.name: Wendy

reviews.text: It is a good place to stay at considering the price that we paid. T
reviews.name: Zolkyzt Hazzel

reviews.text: The picture not as shown in the catalogue. 10 sqm size only for 2 pers, max. Not tidy at all. Ken difficult to reach by phone, poor English.
reviews.name: Hannu

reviews.text: I would stay elsewhere for a bit more money. True the location is amazing but the apartment stinks badly of mold. The one mattress is barley something a person could sleep on. Dirty rags left on the floor and you are also staying in the courtyard next to the garbage. This is one of the worst airbnb's i've stayed in
reviews.name: Philip

reviews.text:
Awesome area for walking around.Metro are very close by ,great neighborhood.The rental is just a place to sleep in and bathe.Its not big enough to sit around and lounge ,make a dinner ,relaxed ect.Kitchen is good for reheating leftovers meals you brought home and making eggs and bacon for breakfast.Beds are comfy and you have no noise to worry about.Host is was very helpful,pick us up at airport and keep in touch with messages.That made it easy on our first trip to Paris.Place does need updating so you don't feel like your in a basement .Cant beat the price for this location,but just be aware of the very small living space your getting.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Tina

reviews.text: place is comfort and easy to find, the host is very helpfull and i hope the leaking water from the bathroom can be fixed. Thank you Mr Ke
reviews.name: Rynaldi

reviews.text: The localization is great, next to Pompidou, but it's just a place to sleep, I really hope the hoster made the pertinent adjustment, he can offer a better place.
reviews.name: Isis

reviews.text: I've been on airbnb for a long time and I love it. But this was the worst experience i had. Everything was dirty from the sheets to the toilet (never been scrubbed ever). The appt itself is so tiny, it is located in a cave (no windows). The beds are hard and not comfortable at all. Overall, this was a horrible experience that I don't wish to anyone. I strongly suggest airbnb to take action to withdraw this appt. It is a unacceptable to pay 70€ for such a disaster.
reviews.name: Adrien

reviews.text: The host canceled this reservation 143 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
reviews.name: Aline

reviews.text: Great Location!!! The flat is Ok. Ke is a lovely host. Perfect for a weekend
reviews.name: Marco

reviews.text: Very good position (next to many metro and bus stop, and few minutes far to place de la republique, canal st martin and the louvre museum), but very small and without cooking supplies: there were one fork, one spoon and one big knife for sushi. There was a big machine for boiled rice! The house was cold altought there was a mobile electric radiator, sufficiently clean except under beds. we give 3 stars: one for the position, one for blankets and one for the comfort of beds.
reviews.name: Anna

reviews.text: A big thanks from us to Ke! Had an amazing time in Paris. An apartament is very close to the metro stop, shops.. Good money and quality proportion. I highly recommend. :)
reviews.name: Donatas

reviews.text: Great (EMAIL HIDDEN)pact space with comfortable beds.
reviews.name: Vidya

reviews.text: Decent place in a central location in Paris. Easily accessible by Metro station.
reviews.name: Kota

reviews.text: Very good location
reviews.name: Oner

reviews.text: The place was really awesome, very close to the attractions. So good localize and Ke was very gently and attentive. We love Tha place and would stay there again in other opportunities. Thanks very much!
reviews.name: Marina

reviews.text: Place was fine for stay. :)
reviews.name: Avantika

reviews.text: Ke was really helpful and he was responding at almost the same moment. Our flight was late at night so he left us staying a bit furher. The location of home was really great! About 5 minutes from Pompidou Centre and 15-20 minutes from Louvre!
reviews.name: Νταϊάννα

reviews.text: The place had a great location 15 minute walk from the louvre and central location on the metro. It is a little small, cold and wet but for a few college kids staying the weekend it was perfectly adequate.
reviews.name: Rachel

reviews.text: Highly suggest this apartment=)
reviews.name: Steinar Westergård

reviews.text: Great location, the place is about what you'd expect for a cheap apartment in Paris. Would recommend if you want to stay in the city for a low price.
reviews.name: Seth
